site_name: Flat A And Flat C1 Poplar GroveLondonW6 7RF
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Replacement of existing roof tiles with new roof tiles at roof level; replacement of existing rooflights and existing window glazing to rear  dormer with new rooflights and timber framed double glazed window to rear dormer in the rear roofslope; replacement of existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed timber framed windows at ground and second floor level to the front elevation; replacement of existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed uPVC framed windows at ground and second floor level, and replacement of existing single glazed timber framed doors with new double glazed uPVC framed doors at ground floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of existing single glazed timber framed door and existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed uPVC framed door and double glazed uPVC framed windows at ground floor level to the side elevation.
